double getdist(ii a, ii b)
{
    return sqrt(pow((double)a.fr - b.fr, 2) + pow((double)a.sc - b.sc, 2));
}

const int mod = oo+7;

int main()
{
    int test;
    ll N,M;
    sf1(test);
    while(test--)
    {
        sf("%lld %lld",&N,&M);
        if(N==1)
            pf("%lld\n",M);
        else if(N==2)
            pf("%lld\n", (M*(M-1))%mod);
        else
        {
            ll ret = M*(M-1);
            ret %= mod;
            ret *= BigMod(M-2,N-2,(ll)mod);
            pf("%lld\n", ret%mod);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
